title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 655 - Special Additional Tax In The Metropolitan Commuter Transportation District And Erie County
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 655 - Special Additional Tax In The Metropolitan Commuter Transportation District And Erie County

State Regulations
§ 655.1 - Recording of mortgages in the counties comprising the Metropolitan Commuter Transportation District and Erie County
§ 655.2 - Distribution of special additional tax in the Metropolitan Commuter Transportation District and Erie County

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 655

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
